document.full_text: steve yzerman of the tampa bay lightning headlined finalists for the nhl general manager of the year award in just his first year on the job, the league said on wednesday.
document.title: lightning's yzerman heads list for gm of the year award
lines_and_colors: steve yzerman of the tampa bay lightning headlined finalists for the nhl general manager of the year award in just his first year on the job, the league said on wednesday.
